channel.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
channel.description:
Just thinking... Do you think they're for the same thing?
After all, we know vortiguants farmed antlions...

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
A few days ago, I have found one aspect to be sure that the thumpers from Xen hasn´t the same function of the combine thumpers. I don´t know why but an extrange program error makes that sometimes you can´t see an extrange green circular ray moveing up above this Xen thumpers, specially if you don´t run during the chapter. (Truly, this happens on my computer at less) Personaly I think that this rays makes this thumpers somthing diferent than the combine thumpers… So, actually I don´t think that this thumpers are for the same puerpose as the Combine ones.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
also Oppossing Force is the only Official expansion wich has the Race-X, of course they only appeared in some sectors of black mesa and mostly after Freeman got into Xen. But for now those ‘‘xen thumpers’’ could count as what I said until valve reveals WTF was the Race-X doing there or if those things are thumpers or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
It’s not that it’s non-canon, it’s just that Valve has departed from that storyline so they don’t factor it into their newer plots, with HL2 and beyond.

That said, Opposing Force does nothing to contradict the overall HL story, so it’s canon unless Valve says otherwise

Read full topic

item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Legomania11
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Opposing Force isn’t canon, so no. Race-X is the creation of a different developer and therefore isn’t considered to be part of the official Half-Life world.

Uh, if its non-canon, then why did Valve promise to soon be doing more with Adrian? Look it up.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Twinsen:

But Xen has lees gravity than Earth and has an other kind of ground, so ,this could be the reason to be a more small thumpers. And if you die in the game this aliens still without fight between them.

srisly in theory this is what (I think) was going to happen with the race-x in oppossing force: they were going to attack and fight against the Xenians while ya fighted against them and black ops but then a guy from valve/gearbox thinked: Why we don’t make them cooperate against the humans? And then the Slave, zombie, headcrab, ichtyosaur and houndeye AI wasn’t updated/changed but the others still being enemies of the Race-X cause of that (also the gargantua will attack the voltigore and the shock trooper but no the pit drone or the shock roach)

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
danielsangeo:

It’s possible for Race-X and Xenians to be enemies but fighting for a common cause: Adrian.

Though, I think that Gearbox intended Race-X to be a class of otherwise unseen Xenians.

Also, the “thumpers” on Xen, I don’t think are intended to keep antlions at bay. The antlion thumpers lift slowly and then pound the ground hard. The “thumpers” on Xen, however, are more “mining” like and don’t make any “thumping” sounds.

But Xen has lees gravity than Earth and has an other kind of ground, so ,this could be the reason to be a more small thumpers. And if you die in the game this aliens still without fight between them.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: rx33gundam
item.description:
mechaelite:

If you spawn in front of a shock trooper/ pit worm a: alien grunt, alien controller, gargantua, bullsquid they are enemies. If you spawn a SLAVE, headcrab, zombie, houndeye or ichtyosaur (dunno if I wrote it well) they r friendly. Possible things: bullsquids, gargantuas, controllers, Agrunts serve directly to the nihilianth and are enemies of the race-x, the other in common Xen fauna and aren’t enemies and the SLAVES are slaves so they don’t really are an enemy

Don’t you know a lot…:meh:

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Twinsen:

I don´t think which the race-X could be enemys of the Xenians, because you can see the vortigaunts fighting close to the shock troopers like a team in Oppossing force. Therefore, I think again that all they are slaves of the combine. In addition you can see the race-X very close to the shock troopers like dogs of them. So, I think that all this can prove that all the new enemys of shephard are not enemys of the Xenians. Then, in any case, if that thumpers are there to maintain far away the shock roaches could be possible although this is not possible for the race-X case, because I have said you that this species are like pets of the shock troopers, so, they aren´t dangerous to the Xenians from my perspective.

PD: The race-X is dangerous for the shock roaches onlyXD
PDII: Sorry for possible mistakes but all this is true, you can check it playing Half-life: Oppossing force. So, by using only this game it is not possible to say which those enemys are enemys of the Xenians because they dosen´t fight between them never in that game.
PDIII: But if you dont belive me I have pics from the game to prove my testimony XD see yaa

If you spawn in front of a shock trooper/ pit worm a: alien grunt, alien controller, gargantua, bullsquid they are enemies. If you spawn a SLAVE, headcrab, zombie, houndeye or ichtyosaur (dunno if I wrote it well) they r friendly. Possible things: bullsquids, gargantuas, controllers, Agrunts serve directly to the nihilianth and are enemies of the race-x, the other in common Xen fauna and aren’t enemies and the SLAVES are slaves so they don’t really are an enemy

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
It’s possible for Race-X and Xenians to be enemies but fighting for a common cause: Adrian.

Though, I think that Gearbox intended Race-X to be a class of otherwise unseen Xenians.

Also, the “thumpers” on Xen, I don’t think are intended to keep antlions at bay. The antlion thumpers lift slowly and then pound the ground hard. The “thumpers” on Xen, however, are more “mining” like and don’t make any “thumping” sounds.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
mechaelite:

sure you will.

Now returning to threat: I have a little question: couldn’t be those thumpers some kind of security to stop the race-X (seen in oppossing force) to attack Xen? I mean as how you can see they teleport though Xen portals to earth and they are enemies of the Xenians. That could be some kind of security sistem against them or against the shock roaches (wich are like ants) of the shock troopers.

I don´t think that the race-X could be enemys of the Xenians, because you can see the vortigaunts fighting close to the shock troopers like a team in Oppossing force. Therefore, I think again that all they are slaves of the combine. In addition you can see the race-X very close to the shock troopers like dogs of them. So, I think that all this can prove that all the new enemys of shephard are not enemys of the Xenians. Then, in any case, if that thumpers are there to maintain far away the shock roaches could be possible although this is not possible for the race-X case, because I have said you that this species are like pets of the shock troopers, so, they aren´t dangerous to the Xenians from my perspective.

PD : The race-X is dangerous for the shock roaches only and the Shock troopers are dangerous for the gargantuas XD
PDII: Sorry for possible mistakes but all this is true, you can check it playing Half-life: Oppossing force. So, by using only this game it is not possible to say which those enemys are enemys of the Xenians because they dosen´t fight between them never in that game.
PDIII: But if you dont belive me I have pics from the game to prove my testimony XD see yaa

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
mechaelite:

Couldn’t the thumpers be some kind of security to stop Race-X (seen in oppossing force) from attacking Xen?

Opposing Force isn’t canon, so no. Race-X is the creation of a different developer and therefore isn’t considered to be part of the official Half-Life world.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

Now returning to threat: I have a little question: couldn’t be those thumpers some kind of security to stop the race-X (seen in oppossing force) to attack Xen? I mean as how you can see they teleport though Xen portals to earth and they are enemies of the Xenians. That could be some kind of security sistem against them or against the shock roaches (wich are like ants) of the shock troopers.

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Twinsen:
mechaelite:

yeah well I’m from spain too but remember this: synths are combine made not from xen.

EDIT: fix’d the word striders and there were no synths in hl1 'cause synths have robotic parts of the body and the agrunts got an armor no robotic parts.^^.

Thanks again for puting striders in my post XD and yeaah sorry I had a terrible mistake I don´t know why but when I spoke you about the synths I was thinking all the time in aliens controllers this ones I think that were modificate like the grunts and vorts like the post humans basically because they are too [COLOR=‘Red’]inteligent to be only organics machines and I think that the combine used the aliens controllers to design Nihilanths body, thats all. I have searched synths on line and you are right this ones only have appeared on Half life 2 on the citadel. I hope to see this little bastards in action ^^.

fix’d again LoL

EDIT: Also fixed my quote.

item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Twinsen:

XD Sorry for my ortography and for my english. I am from Spain and I dont know the english names of all that species except in spanish ( for example antlions=Hormigas león ^^ ) but usually I try to write well. I think that the vortigaunts , synths and grunts are slaves from Xen. And I think that all this kind of aliens have been modificated like the post-humans with the technology from the combine. But ,I am agree with the posibility about of this 2 last species, that probably was make completly by the combine like the [COLOR=‘Red’]striders. Well, maybe I´m wrong but is my opinion and by the moment I haven´t saw anything on half life that could indicate other posibility.

In any case the vorts said you in half life 2 that they was aunder control a lot of time, so, I think that they were invaded by the combine. So, if they are from Xen and they have herded antlions, then, antlions are from Xen and probably the thumpers from Xen are there to maintain the antlions far away to the grunts and to the synths. But I repeat is my personal opinion XD but I think that by using only the half life infomation all this have a lot of sense by the moment.

yeah well I’m from spain too but remember this: synths are combine made not from xen.

EDIT: fix’d the word striders and there were no synths in hl1 'cause synths have robotic parts of the body and the agrunts got an armor no robotic parts.

rx33gundam:

REMEMBER that the only reason they went to XEN is to escape the Combine Empire! So probably the Vorts left their flock in their home world. It was 1995 when Nihilanth’s race retreated to XEN. About 5 years before the resonance cascade so 5 years is not enough to establish much technology or to farm antlions. So there were no antlions in XEN.

I’m sure that’s completely fake. Also I think the antlions are originally from Xen, the Nihilianth’s death portals only opened up in:
-Xen.
-A planet under combine control.
-Earth.

Read full topic
item.source: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?

item.title: Are the Xen Thumpers for the same puerpose as the Combine ones?
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
mechaelite:

1 antlions goes without - but don’t have to worry about that, ortography isn’t really important in this kind of forums…

2 since when the synths are from Xen instead of combine made?

XD Sorry for my ortography and for my english. I am from Spain and I dont know the english names of all that species except in spanish ( for example antlions=Hormigas león ^^ ) but usually I try to write well. I think that the vortigaunts , synths and grunts are slaves from Xen. And I think that all this kind of aliens have been modificated like the post-humans with the technology from the combine. But ,I am agree with the posibility about of this 2 last species, that probably was make completly by the combine like the strikers. Well, maybe I´m wrong but is my opinion and by the moment I haven´t saw anything on half life that could indicate other posibility.

In any case the vorts said you in half life 2 that they was aunder control a lot of time, so, I think that they were invaded by the combine. So, if they are from Xen and they have herded antlions, then, antlions are from Xen and probably the thumpers from Xen are there to maintain the antlions far away to the grunts and to the synths. But I repeat is my personal opinion XD but I think that by using only the half life infomation all this have a lot of sense by the moment.

Read full topic
